objective: Monitor cloud resources and provide health status updates via Slack notifications
steps: - Collect system health and resource status information
- Monitor resource utilization patterns and trends
- Identify potential issues or anomalies in resource performance
- Generate health status summary for monitored resources
- Send periodic health reports via Slack notifications
- Alert on critical resource issues requiring attention
guardrails: - Define health check thresholds for resource monitoring
- Include specific details for each resource: Name, Status, Utilization, Health Score
- Focus on resources showing performance degradation or anomalies
